content.title: Safai Karmakar Hetu Aavashyak Upakaran Sahayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Safai Karmakar Hetu Aavashyak Upakaran Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 02 September 2015. The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing required equipment for their work.
benefits: Registered sanitation workers will receive a grant of ₹ 700/- (Indian Rupees seven hundred only) to purchase essential equipment such as gum boots, gloves, masks, and aprons.
Assistance amount will be provided every year.
eligibility: Applicant must be registered with the State Social Security Board in any district of Chhattisgarh.
Applicant should not receive assistance from any other parallel scheme of the State Government.
Applicant should be between 18 and 60 years.
documents_required: Proof of being a sanitation worker

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Safai Karmakar Hetu Aavashyak Upakaran Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 02 September 2011.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing required equipment for their work.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant age must be between 18 to 60 years.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the benefits of parallel scheme from the state government?
faqs.answer: Applicant must not receiving any other parallel scheme of the state government.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
